ti

Class Cosine

  • java.lang.Object
    • ti.Cosine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RetrievalModel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CosineWithFeedback

    public class Cosine
extends Object
implements RetrievalModel
    Implements retrieval in a vector space with the cosine similarity function and a TFxIDF weight formulation.

    • Method Detail

      • runQuery

        public ArrayList<Tuple<Integer,Double>> runQuery(String queryText,
                                        Index index,
                                        DocumentProcessor docProcessor)
        Runs the given query and returns the list of documents sorted by similarity.
        Specified by:
        runQuery in interface RetrievalModel
        Parameters:
        queryText - the text of the query.
        index - the index to search in.
        docProcessor - the DocumentProcessor to extract query terms.
        Returns:
        a list of Tuples where the first item is the docID and the second one the similarity score.

      • computeScores

        protected ArrayList<Tuple<Integer,Double>> computeScores(ArrayList<Tuple<Integer,Double>> queryVector,
                                             Index index)
        Returns the list of documents in the specified index sorted by similarity with the specified query vector.
        Parameters:
        queryVector - the vector with query term weights.
        index - the index to search in.
        Returns:
        a list of Tuples where the first item is the docID and the second one the similarity score.

      • computeVector

        protected ArrayList<Tuple<Integer,Double>> computeVector(ArrayList<String> terms,
                                             Index index)
        Compute the vector of weights for the specified list of terms.
        Parameters:
        terms - the list of terms.
        index - the index
        Returns:
        a list of Tuples with the termID as first item and the weight as second one.
